metadata.Title: CVE-2015-4017 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Salt before 2014.7.6 does not verify certificates when connecting via the aliyun, proxmox, and splunk modules.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-4017` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

salt-api - 2015.8.8+ds-1
salt-cloud - 2015.8.8+ds-1
salt-common - 2015.8.8+ds-1
salt-master - 2015.8.8+ds-1
salt-minion - 2015.8.8+ds-1
salt-proxy - 2015.8.8+ds-1
salt-ssh - 2015.8.8+ds-1
salt-syndic - 2015.8.8+ds-1
No subscription required

notes.Note: sbeattie> vuln modules are only present in 2014.7.0 and later

criterions.comment: salt package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2015.8.8+ds-1').
